abstract: Mexican national legislature agrees to meet in special session to debate package of anticorruption measures, following public outcry over series of delays in bring initiative up for debate; lawmakers will address proposed rules compelling all public servants to publicly disclose assets, potential conflicts of interest and proof they are paying taxes.
lead_paragraph: A public outcry has compelled the national legislature to debate a package of measures, which were the result of a citizens’ initiative, in a special session.

headline.main: Grass-Roots Anticorruption Drive Puts Heat on Mexican Lawmakers
headline.print_headline: Grass-Roots Drive Is Forcing Mexico to Confront Its Corruption
